stack.description: The vdpgm stack provides a ROS inteface to the matlab code written by Kenichi Kurihara for Variational Dirichlet Process Gaussian Mixture Models. The contained packages should be migrated to catkin, but since rosjava still lives in the world of rosmake, we're sticking with the old regime for now.
stack.author: Maintained by Luke Teacy (wtlt@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
